text: “I have told you all these things so that you will not fall away.

They will <st data-num="4160">put</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="656">out of<n id="1" /> the synagogue</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">yet</st> a <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st><n id="3" /> is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> when the one who <st data-num="615" class="">kills</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st> he is <st data-num="4374" class="">offering</st> <st data-num="2999" class="">service</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.<n id="4" />

They<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="1097" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">known</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.<n id="2" />

But I have told you these things so that when their time comes, you will remember that I told you about them.

“I did not tell you these things from the beginning because I was with you.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> I am <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the one who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3762">not one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> is <st data-num="2065" class="">asking</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, ‘<st data-num="4226">Where</st> are you <st data-num="5217" class="">going?’</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> are <st data-num="4137" class="">filled</st> with <st data-num="3077" class="">sadness</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I have <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, it <st data-num="4851" class="">is</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4851" class="">advantage</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="565" class="">going away</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> I do <st data-num="3361">not</st> <st data-num="565" class="">go away</st>, the <st data-num="3875" class="">Advocate</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st>, I will <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> when <st data-num="1565">he</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st>, he will <st data-num="1651" class="">prove</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1651" class="">wrong</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st>—

<st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st><n id="1" /> they do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me;</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st><n id="2" /> I am <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3765">no longer</st>;
and concerning judgment because the ruler of this world has been condemned.
“I have many more things to say to you, but you cannot bear them now.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> <st data-num="1565">he</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st>, he will <st data-num="3594" class="">guide</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722">into</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> he will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="575" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> authority,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> will <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">whatever</st> he <st data-num="191" class="">hears</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="312" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="5" /> what is to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1565" class="">He</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="1392" class="">glorify</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1699">me</st> what is mine<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="312" class="">tell</st> it to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3956" class="">Everything</st> <st data-num="3745">that</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1699">mine</st>; <st data-num="1223 3778">that is why</st> I <st data-num="3004">said</st> the Spirit<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1699">me</st> what is mine<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="312" class="">tell</st> it to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="3" />
In a little while you will see me no longer; again after a little while, you will see me.”

Then some of his disciples said to one another, “What is the meaning of what he is saying, ‘In a little while you will not see me; again after a little while, you will see me,’ and ‘because I am going to the Father’?”
So they kept on repeating, “What is the meaning of what he says, ‘In a little while’? We do not understand what he is talking about.”

Jesus could see that they wanted to ask him about these things, so he said to them, “Are you asking each other about this—that I said, ‘In a little while you will not see me; again after a little while, you will see me’?

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281">solemn</st> <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="2799" class="">weep</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2354" class="">wail</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161">but</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> will <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice;</st> you will be <st data-num="3076" class="">sad</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">sadness</st> will <st data-num="1096" class="">turn</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st>.

<st data-num="3752" class="">When</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="5088">gives birth</st>, she <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">distress</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st><n id="2" /> has <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> her <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st> is <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st>, she <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="3421" class="">remembers</st> the <st data-num="2347" class="">suffering</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> her <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> a <st data-num="444">human being</st><n id="3" /> has been <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.<n id="4" />
So also you have sorrow now, but I will see you again, and your hearts will rejoice, and no one will take your joy away from you.

<st data-num="1722" class="">At</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> you will <st data-num="2065" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3762">nothing</st>. I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281">solemn</st> <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="302 5100">whatever</st> you <st data-num="154" class="">ask</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> he will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="3" />
Until now you have not asked for anything in my name. Ask and you will receive it, so that your joy may be complete.
“I have told you these things in obscure figures of speech; a time is coming when I will no longer speak to you in obscure figures, but will tell you plainly about the Father.

<st data-num="1722" class="">At</st> <st data-num="1565">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> you will <st data-num="154">ask</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="2065" class="">ask</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="4012">on</st> <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">behalf</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="5368" class="">loves</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="5368" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">came</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">God</st>.<n id="1" />
I came from the Father and entered into the world, but in turn, I am leaving the world and going back to the Father.”
His disciples said, “Look, now you are speaking plainly and not in obscure figures of speech!
Now we know that you know everything and do not need anyone to ask you anything. Because of this we believe that you have come from God.”
Jesus replied, “Do you now believe?

<st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, a <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> has <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>—when you will be <st data-num="4650" class="">scattered</st>, <st data-num="1538">each one</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> home,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2504" class="">I</st> will be <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">alone</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st><n id="4" /> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">alone</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> my <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
I have told you these things so that in me you may have peace. In the world you have trouble and suffering, but take courage—I have conquered the world.”
